article_title: Can Joni Ernst be this out of touch?
article_text:
Buy Photo Joni Ernst, Iowa Senate candidate, talks with guests before The Robb Kelley Spring Dinner on Tuesday, May 20, 2014, at the Downtown Marriott Hotel in Des Moines, Iowa. (Photo: Charlie Litchfield/The Register)Buy Photo

Is Joni Ernst so out of touch that she is unaware that thousands of innocent people are killed by gun violence every year? Glorifying deadly weapons has no place in our political discourse.

— Barbara Paulding, Russell

Read or Share this story: http://www.desmoinesregister.com/story/opinion/readers/2014/05/27/letter-editor-can-joni-ernst-touch/9606457/
